articles.description: Also in the top 10: Reissues spur returns for The Beatles’ Revolver and Baby Keem’s The Melodic Blue, while Kodak Black’s latest debuts.
articles.content: Taylor Swift’s Midnights easily tops the Billboard 200 chart (dated Nov. 12) for a second week, following its blockbuster debut at No. 1 a week earlier. The set earned 342,000 equivalent album units … [+5184 chars]
